meanings.definition: Acriflavines: a type of antiseptic used in veterinary medicine.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian applied acriflavines to the wound to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: The acriflavines were effective in keeping the animals healthy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the acriflavines were a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: The acriflavines acted like tiny soldiers, fighting off any harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the acriflavines made them easy to spot in the clinic.

meanings.definition: Acriflavines: a group of synthetic dyes with antibacterial properties.
meanings.sent1: The researchers studied the effects of acriflavines on bacterial growth.
meanings.sent2: The acriflavines were used to dye fabrics while also preventing bacterial contamination.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer accidentally spilled the acriflavines on the white dress, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The acriflavines worked like invisible shields, protecting the material from harmful microbes.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of the acriflavines lingered in the air long after they were used.
